## Overview

This document contains 5 high-quality AI frontend prompts for generating key components of the Alkemy AI Studio V2.0 platform. These prompts are designed to work with AI code generation tools like v0.dev, Lovable, and other similar platforms.

**Technical Stack Requirements:**
- React 19 with TypeScript (strict mode)
- Tailwind CSS with custom design system
- Radix UI components for accessibility
- Framer Motion for animations
- Professional film production workflow design

**Brand Specifications:**
- Primary Accent: Yellow (#FFD700) for CTAs, highlights, and active states
- Secondary: Dark blue-gray (#2C3E50) for text and professional elements
- Typography: Inter font family, Roboto Mono for technical details
- Responsive breakpoints: Mobile (320px-767px), Tablet (768px-1023px), Desktop (1024px-1439px), Wide (1440px+)

## Prompt 1: Main Dashboard/Project Interface

### Component Description
Create a sophisticated film production dashboard interface for Alkemy AI Studio V2.0 that serves as the central hub for project management, quick actions, and collaboration.

### Technical Requirements
- React 19 with TypeScript and functional components using hooks
- Tailwind CSS for styling with custom design system
- Framer Motion for smooth animations and micro-interactions
- Radix UI components for accessibility (Dialog, Tabs, Select, etc.)
- Responsive design with breakpoints for mobile, tablet, desktop, and wide screens

### Visual Design
- Brand color: Yellow (#FFD700) as primary accent for CTAs, highlights, and active states
- Secondary: Dark blue-gray (#2C3E50) for text and professional elements
- Professional gradient backgrounds with subtle film reel animations
- Clean, modern layout with 12-column CSS Grid system
- Inter font family for primary text, Roboto Mono for technical details

### Key Features
1. **Project Cards**: Display project thumbnail, title, last modified, workflow completion status
2. **Progress Indicators**: Visual bar showing Script → Moodboard → Cast → Scene Assembly → Post-Production stages
3. **Quick Action Buttons**: Floating action buttons with yellow accent and hover animations
4. **Search & Filter**: Project search with category filters (genre, status, date range)
5. **Collaboration Indicators**: Show active collaborators and real-time updates
6. **Notifications**: Toast notifications for project updates, generation completion, team activities

### Data Structure
```typescript
interface Project {
  id: string;
  title: string;
  thumbnail?: string;
  lastModified: Date;
  workflowStage: 'script' | 'moodboard' | 'cast' | 'scene-assembly' | 'post-production';
  progress: number; // 0-100
  collaborators: User[];
  status: 'draft' | 'in-progress' | 'completed';
  metadata: {
    scenes: number;
    characters: number;
    locations: number;
    generatedMedia: number;
  };
}
```

### Accessibility Requirements
- WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with 4.5:1 color contrast ratios
- Full keyboard navigation with focus indicators (2px solid yellow outline)
- Screen reader support with semantic HTML and ARIA labels
- Touch targets minimum 44x44px for mobile devices
- High contrast mode support

## Prompt 2: Script Analysis and Upload Component

### Component Description
Create a professional script analysis and upload component for Alkemy AI Studio V2.0 with advanced AI-powered screenplay processing capabilities that transforms written scripts into structured production data.

### Technical Requirements
- React 19 with TypeScript, functional components with modern hooks
- Tailwind CSS with custom film production design system
- File handling with drag-and-drop support using react-dropzone
- AI service integration for script analysis (Gemini API integration)
- Progress tracking with real-time status updates
- Radix UI components for accessibility and consistent interactions

### Key Features
1. **Multi-Format Upload Support:**
   - PDF with text extraction
   - Plain text (.txt) files
   - Final Draft (.fdx) XML parsing
   - Fountain format support
   - File size validation (max 50MB)

2. **Drag-and-Drop Interface:**
   - Visual feedback for drag-over states
   - File validation with error messages
   - Multiple file support (merge capability)
   - Upload progress with percentage
   - Cancel upload functionality

3. **Script Analysis Pipeline:**
   ```typescript
   interface ScriptAnalysis {
     title: string;
     logline: string;
     summary: string;
     scenes: AnalyzedScene[];
     characters: AnalyzedCharacter[];
     locations: AnalyzedLocation[];
     estimatedDuration: number; // in minutes
     genre: string[];
     tone: string[];
   }
   ```

4. **Interactive Script Viewer:**
   - Page-turning animation for script navigation
   - Scene-by-scene breakdown view
   - Character highlighting throughout script
   - Location tagging and color-coding
   - Search functionality within script

5. **Analysis Dashboard:**
   - Script statistics (pages, scenes, characters, locations)
   - Character relationship mapping
   - Scene density visualization
   - Estimated production timeline
   - AI confidence scores for extractions

### Error Handling & Validation
- File type validation with helpful error messages
- File size limits with upgrade suggestions
- Corrupted file detection
- Script format validation
- Character encoding detection
- Network error handling with retry options

## Prompt 3: Character Identity Management Modal

### Component Description
Create an advanced character identity training modal for Alkemy AI Studio V2.0 that manages LoRA model training for consistent character appearance across AI generations, achieving 90-98% visual similarity.

### Technical Requirements
- React 19 with TypeScript and strict type safety
- Tailwind CSS with professional film production design system
- Framer Motion for sophisticated animations and state transitions
- Radix UI Dialog for modal accessibility and overlay management
- Advanced image processing with file validation and optimization
- Integration with Fal.ai API for LoRA model training
- Real-time progress tracking with WebSocket connections

### Key Features
1. **Advanced Image Upload System:**
   - Drag-and-drop support for multiple images
   - Image validation with quality assessment
   - Automatic cropping and optimization
   - Support for JPEG, PNG, WebP formats
   - Real-time preview with resolution info
   - Image quality scoring and recommendations

2. **Training Workflow Management:**
   ```typescript
   enum TrainingStage {
     UPLOADING = 'uploading',      // Uploading reference images
     VALIDATING = 'validating',    // Validating image quality
     PREPARING = 'preparing',      // Preparing training data
     TRAINING = 'training',        // Training LoRA model
     TESTING = 'testing',          // Testing trained model
     READY = 'ready',             // Model ready for use
     FAILED = 'failed'            // Training failed
   }
   ```

3. **Real-Time Progress Tracking:**
   - WebSocket connection for live updates
   - Stage-based progress indicators
   - Estimated time remaining
   - Current operation status
   - Error reporting with suggested fixes

4. **Visual Identity Testing:**
   - Automated test prompt generation
   - Side-by-side comparison viewer
   - CLIP similarity scoring (target: 90-98%)
   - Perceptual hash comparison
   - Iterative improvement suggestions

5. **Identity Strength Controls:**
   - Adjustable LoRA strength (0.0 - 1.0)
   - Style preservation settings
   - Character feature weighting
   - Manual override options
   - Real-time preview of changes

### Cost Estimation
- Training cost calculation based on image count and quality
- API usage tracking and warnings
- Subscription tier integration
- Budget override options

## Prompt 4: Scene Assembly Timeline Interface

### Component Description
Create a professional scene assembly timeline interface for Alkemy AI Studio V2.0 that provides film editors with an intuitive, shot-by-shot compositing workflow with frame-accurate editing and AI generation integration.

### Technical Requirements
- React 19 with TypeScript and advanced state management
- Tailwind CSS with professional film editing aesthetic
- Complex drag-and-drop system with react-beautiful-dnd or custom implementation
- Video/audio playback integration with HTML5 media APIs
- Canvas-based timeline rendering with performant scrolling
- Keyboard shortcuts system for professional workflow efficiency
- Radix UI components for accessibility and consistent interactions

### Key Features
1. **Professional Timeline Controls:**
   - Frame-accurate scrubbing with mouse drag
   - Keyboard navigation (J/K/L for shuttle, Space for play/pause)
   - Zoom controls with mouse wheel support
   - Snap-to-frames and snap-to-clips
   - Multi-selection with Shift/Cmd modifiers
   - Ripple edit and insert edit modes

2. **Multi-Track Audio Management:**
   - Waveform visualization for audio tracks
   - Audio level adjustment with envelope control
   - Fade in/out with draggable handles
   - Audio ducking for voiceover clarity
   - Multi-track audio mixing

3. **AI Generation Integration:**
   - Right-click context menu for "Generate Similar"
   - Batch generation with character identity injection
   - Real-time generation progress on timeline
   - Style transfer application to clips
   - Automatic upscaling and enhancement options

4. **Professional Editing Tools:**
   - J-cut and L-cut support (audio/video offset)
   - Slip and slide edits for precise timing
   - Roll edits with ripple propagation
   - Three-point and four-point editing
   - Match frame functionality
   - Multi-camera editing support

### Data Structure
```typescript
interface TimelineClip {
  id: string;
  type: 'video' | 'image' | 'audio' | 'effect' | 'text';
  trackId: string;
  startTime: number; // in seconds
  duration: number; // in seconds
  media: {
    url: string;
    thumbnail?: string;
    width: number;
    height: number;
    format: string;
  };
  effects: ClipEffect[];
  metadata: {
    frameNumber?: number;
    sceneId?: string;
    characterIds?: string[];
    generationPrompt?: string;
    aiModel?: string;
  };
}
```

### Keyboard Shortcuts
- **Playback:** Space (toggle), J/K/L (shuttle), ←/→ (frame navigation)
- **Editing:** S (split), Delete (remove), Cmd+Z/Y (undo/redo), Cmd+C/V (copy/paste)
- **View:** +/- (zoom), Home/End (navigate), F (fit to window)

### Performance Optimizations
- Virtual scrolling for large timelines
- Clip thumbnail caching and lazy loading
- Web Workers for heavy processing tasks
- GPU acceleration for video processing
- Efficient state management with React Context and useReducer

## Prompt 5: Generation Progress and Results Display

### Component Description
Create a sophisticated generation progress and results display system for Alkemy AI Studio V2.0 that handles multiple concurrent AI generations with real-time progress tracking, comprehensive result management, and advanced analytics.

### Technical Requirements
- React 19 with TypeScript and advanced concurrent state management
- Tailwind CSS with professional AI generation workflow aesthetic
- WebSocket integration for real-time progress updates
- Framer Motion for smooth animations and state transitions
- Virtual scrolling for handling large result sets
- Advanced caching strategy for generated media
- Radix UI components for consistent accessibility

### Key Features
1. **Multi-Job Progress Tracking:**
   - Circular progress with stage indicators
   - Linear progress bar for queue view
   - Stage-based progress breakdown
   - Real-time WebSocket updates
   - Concurrent generation management

2. **Advanced Results Gallery:**
   - Masonry grid layout with responsive item sizing
   - Lazy loading with skeleton placeholders
   - Infinite scroll for large result sets
   - Advanced filtering and search capabilities
   - Batch selection and bulk operations
   - Comparison view for multiple variations

3. **Smart Caching Strategy:**
   ```typescript
   interface CacheManager {
     // Multi-level caching
     cache: {
       memory: Map<string, CachedResult>,    // Fast access for recent items
       indexedDB: IDBDatabase,               // Persistent storage
       cloud: CloudStorage                   // Backup and sharing
     },

     // Cache policies
     policies: {
       images: { maxSize: '500MB', ttl: 7days },
       videos: { maxSize: '2GB', ttl: 30days },
       metadata: { maxSize: '50MB', ttl: 1day }
     }
   }
   ```

4. **Real-Time Cost Tracking:**
   - Current session spending with budget warnings
   - Cost estimation by model and parameters
   - Spending limits and alerts
   - Cost optimization suggestions

5. **Quality Assessment Tools:**
   - Visual similarity scoring for character consistency
   - Technical quality metrics (resolution, compression artifacts)
   - Content safety verification
   - AI model confidence scores
   - User feedback collection system

6. **Generation Variants Management:**
   - Side-by-side comparison tools
   - Slider comparison for before/after
   - Difference visualization
   - Variant scoring and ranking
   - User preference tracking

### Error Handling and Recovery
- Automatic retry with exponential backoff
- Error categorization (network, rate limit, content filter, credits)
- User-friendly error messages with actionable suggestions
- Graceful degradation for service outages

### Analytics and Insights
- Generation success rate by model and parameters
- Cost analysis with optimization suggestions
- Performance metrics (average generation time, queue wait time)
- User behavior patterns and preferences
- Resource utilization tracking

- **Bundle Reduction:** 62% size reduction from 426KB to 164KB through improved chunking strategy

All required environment variables are configured in Vercel Dashboard:
- Gemini API keys for AI generation

- These prompts are designed to work with the existing Alkemy codebase structure
- All components should integrate seamlessly with the current service layer (`aiService.ts`, `characterIdentityService.ts`, etc.)
- Type definitions should align with `types.ts` (478 lines covering entire domain model)
- Components should follow the existing tab-based workflow architecture
- All generated components should maintain WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance

### Customization Guidelines

- **Brand Colors:** Adjust yellow accent (#FFD700) and secondary colors as needed
- **Animations:** Modify timing and easing functions to match product requirements
- **Responsive Breakpoints:** Adjust pixel values based on target device demographics
- **API Integration:** Update service calls to match your backend implementation
- **State Management:** Adapt to your preferred state management solution (Redux, Zustand, etc.)
